name: Mini Map
description:
In Mini Map you are the hero's map and you must lead him through a treacherous dungeon by pinging the mini map. However, you only have a limitted number of pings before you run out. Can you lead the hero safely to the end? Good luck!

Follow me on Twitter --> https://twitter.com/SquishyTurtleDv

Music by 3uhox -->  https://opengameart.org/content/wind-jam

Pathfinding asset used -->  https://arongranberg.com/astar/
